ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I have a question about a quest!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i did this quest very often with my ogre warrior. i did the quest so often with her, that she can not only use the bank, but also train in qeynos (i moved
ygData.messageBody:
Thomas H. Comegys wrote:

> Captain Tillin is in the Grounds of Fate (Warrior guild/Arena) in South
> Qeynos. You enter the Grounds of Fate, turn right before entering the PVP
> area and go up the ramp. At the top turn left and follow the elevated
> walkway to the building at the other end. Go inside and turn to the left.
> Captain Tillin is standing outside on the balcony.
>
> Be aware that turning in gnoll fangs to him lowers your faction with the
> Corrupt Qeynos Guards. My level 41 druid is KOS to the Corrupt Qeynos Guards
> now. Every time he has entered North Qeynos, even in wolf form, Lieutenant
> Dagarok has killed him. I will say that you would have to turn in a LOT of
> gnoll fangs though.


i did this quest very often with my ogre warrior. i did the quest so
often with her, that she can not only use the bank, but also train in
qeynos (i moved her as level four to qeynos; at 13 she could train there
for the first time). don't ask me how many fangs i turned in, but it
were real many. well, doing it with an ogre is extreme, but doable. but
don't try it as ogre shammy or sk (not sure about others), tillin really
has problems with not only races, but also with deities.

on the other hand, with a "normal" char, you should also do the
moonstone quest:
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=544

if you don't do this quest for the factions (well, both of them), the
exp of them should be good until 12, maybe up to 15. i didn't do it for
the exp, but only for faction.


Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 52 (close to 53 now) female gnome magician
epic state: 17 of 24 items obtained
Tarew Marr


ps: for the mages out there who are working on their epic quest:
captain rottgrime can be done by a lvl 52 mage, with the help of
a lvl 46 cleric ... well, and the help of a lvl 41 wizard as puller.
no, it wasn't fun and very close, but no one died !
http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=4222
